brand_identity.name: DroughtGuard
brand_identity.mission: Proactive water stress management and rapid tanker allocation for district resilience.

typography.instructions: Use Manrope for all headings to give a technical yet human feel. Use Inter for body text for maximum legibility. Use JetBrains Mono for all data tables, coordinates, and sensor readings.

containers.card: bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200
containers.map_container: h-[600px] w-full rounded-xl overflow-hidden border border-slate-300 relative z-0

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 h-10 px-6 rounded-md font-medium transition-colors focus:ring-2 focus:ring-slate-400 focus:ring-offset-2
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 h-10 px-6 rounded-md font-medium transition-colors
buttons.critical: bg-red-600 text-white hover:bg-red-700 h-10 px-6 rounded-md shadow-sm

inputs.default: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-slate-200 bg-white px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-white file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-slate-500 focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-slate-950 focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

cards.stat: flex flex-col p-6 bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-xl shadow-sm

status_badges.critical: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border border-red-200 bg-red-50 px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold text-red-700
status_badges.warning: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border-orange-200 bg-orange-50 px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold text-orange-700
status_badges.safe: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border-green-200 bg-green-50 px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold text-green-700

drought_hero.usage: Use as a subtle background overlay or hero image for empty states in critical zones.

village_aerial.usage: Use in Village Details cards or headers.

water_tanker.usage: Use in Tanker Allocation view or as an icon representation for logistics.

universal_guidelines: Always use 'Manrope' for headings and 'Inter' for body.
Data visualization is priority. Ensure charts are readable and accessible.
Use 'Slate' colors for neutrals, avoiding pure black.
Map markers should use color coding: Red (Critical), Orange (Warning), Green (Safe).
Interactive elements must have hover states (opacity or brightness change).
Ensure generous padding (p-6+) in dashboard cards.
Use Skeleton loaders for data fetching states.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds unless specified for status alerts.

instructions_to_main_agent.step_1: Setup the layout shell with a sidebar navigation and top header.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Create the Dashboard View with Summary Cards (Total Villages, Critical Zones, Tankers Available) and a Rainfall Trend Chart.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Implement the Map View using React Leaflet. Mock village data with lat/long if backend is not ready.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Build the Tanker Allocation interface with a list of requests and a simple 'Allocate' action.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_5: Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes for testing.
